description: This Rosé Berry Bliss Punch is sure to become a new party favorite. Created originally by Clos du Bois, the simple recipe pairs&nbsp;wine with blueberries and pink&nbsp;lemonade for an elegant sparkle that will make your guests' mouths water!This drink can be served at weddings or any other event where you want people who love good beverages in style.
keywords: How To Rosé Berry Bliss Punch
Rosé Berry Bliss Punch Cocktail Recipe
name: Rosé Berry Bliss Punch

recipeInstructions.name: Mix the rosé wine with the blueberries and the lemonade in a large pitcher.
recipeInstructions.text: Mix the rosé wine with the blueberries and the lemonade in a large pitcher.

recipeInstructions.name: Put it in the fridge for one hour to ensure the flavors are blended well.
recipeInstructions.text: Put it in the fridge for one hour to ensure the flavors are blended well.

recipeInstructions.name: Serve it on your wine glasses and top it off with lemon-lime soda.
recipeInstructions.text: Serve it on your wine glasses and top it off with lemon-lime soda.
